DOC.brief_summary: This is a global, multi-center, prospective, randomized, controlled study of the safety and effectiveness of renal denervation with the OneShot Renal Denervation System in patients with uncontrolled hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Renal Sympathetic Denervation for Resistant Hypertension II
